long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vertti Anywhere is a thin client solution that extends the reach of the Vertti ERP to the corporate network or the web. It enables the creation of a private cloud, allowing authorized employees, business partners, and customers to securely access the ERP from anywhere, regardless of connection, location, client platform, or operating system.
